# score margins for masstrixR mz matching
masstrixR.mz_rel_good=0.1
masstrixR.mz_rel_acceptable=0.5
masstrixR.mz_rel_bad=1.0
# score margins for masstrixR RT matching
masstrixR.rt_abs_good=0.2
masstrixR.rt_abs_acceptable=0.5
masstrixR.rt_abs_bad=1.0
# score margins for masstrixR CCS matching
masstrixR.ccs_rel_good=0.5
masstrixR.ccs_rel_acceptable=1.0
masstrixR.ccs_rel_bad=2.5
